summary: Autoplay + persistence logic was added/updated in the `useBackgroundMusic` hook and the NavBar UI was updated to show a playing indicator and an autoplay-blocked message. However, the diff summary does not provide concrete evidence that the new flute audio file was actually added under `frontend/public/assets/audio/` (it is only referenced).
